modName: Say hello to my little friend
summary: Replaces the default dong noise on a critical hit, to the epic line from Scarface :)
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys, this is my first mod, just an idea i had, don\'t forget to endorse if you like, enjoy :)

~~~~

[b]Description:[/b] 
This mod simply adds a .wav sound file so that the annoying thud noise played when hitting a critical, is replaced with a much more pleasant one ;)
This is just for fun really.

Click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AVQ8byG2mY8]here[/url] for the original video.

~~~~

[b]Install:[/b]
Should just work with NMM. If not just manually extract into data.

~~~~

[b]Uninstall:[/b]
Either remove with NMM. Or remove the file data\\Sound\\Fx\\ui\\ui_sneakattack_01
author: Biggsamus

files.name: Say Hello To My Little Friend
files.fileName: Say Hello To My Little Friend-19539-0-5.rar
